message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $850,000 is tempting, I'm not quite ready to let go of the product for that price.  How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?  This still gives you a good value and allows me to get a more favorable price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
